title: Pushpa_2:_The_Rule
extract: Pushpa 2: The Rule is a 2024 Indian Telugu-language action drama film directed by Sukumar and produced by Mythri Movie Makers, in association with Sukumar Writings. The film stars Allu Arjun in the titular role, alongside Rashmika Mandanna, Fahadh Faasil, Jagapathi Babu, Dhananjaya, Rao Ramesh, Sunil and Anasuya Bharadwaj. It is the second instalment of the Pushpa film series and the sequel to the 2021 film Pushpa: The Rise. The film follows Pushpa Raj, a small time daily wagerer risen to the ranks of sandalwood smuggler, who struggles to sustain his business as he faces tough opposition from the police led by Shekhawat.
trendingreason:
The article on Wikipedia about "Pushpa 2: The Rule" could be trending due to its connection with Allu Arjun's popularity and recent box office success, stirring conversations among fans of Telugu cinema especially around the time when new sequels or films featuring him are released.

Alternative Reason: Given that this is a holiday season in India (Deepavali), articles related to Indian culture, family reunions and special occasions often see increased activity on Wikipedia discussing movies where such themes can be found resonating with the audience's celebrations at home.

title: Justin_Baldoni
extract: Justin Louis Baldoni is an American actor and director. Baldoni started his career as an actor portraying Rafael Solano on the CW telenovela Jane the Virgin (2014–2019). He has since directed the romantic drama films Five Feet Apart (2019), Clouds (2020) and It Ends with Us (2024).
trendingreason: Justin Baldoni's article may be trending on Wikipedia due to his recent work, particularly for directing "It Ends with Us" in 2024; this could have sparked interest if the film was critically acclaimed or released during a holiday season when entertainment news peaks. Additionally, updates from Baldoni's career announcements and trivia related to his acting roles might also contribute to increased engagement on Wikipedia as of December 24th, 2024.

title: Mufasa:_The_Lion_King
extract: Mufasa: The Lion King is a 2024 American musical drama film directed by Barry Jenkins from a screenplay written by Jeff Nathanson. Produced by Walt Disney Pictures, the film is photorealistically animated and serves as both a prequel and sequel to The Lion King (2019), the remake of the 1994 animated film of the same name. Seth Rogen, Billy Eichner, Donald Glover, Beyoncé Knowles-Carter, and John Kani reprise their roles from the remake; new cast members include Aaron Pierre, Kelvin Harrison Jr., Tiffany Boone, Mads Mikkelsen, Thandiwe Newton, Lennie James, Anika Noni Rose, and Blue Ivy Carter in her feature film debut.
trendingreason: The Mufasa: The Lion King article might be trending on Wikipedia due to the highly anticipated release of a new musical drama adaptation based on Disney's classic movie; this version promises advanced photorealistic animation as both prequel and sequel, with familiar actors reprising their roles alongside an ensemble cast including Aaron Pierre, Kelvin Harrison Jr., Tiffany Boone, Mads Mikkelsen, Thandiwe Newton, Lennie James, Anika Noni Rose, and Blue Ivy Carter.

title: Sonic_the_Hedgehog_3_(film)
extract: Sonic the Hedgehog 3 is a 2024 action-adventure comedy film based on the video game series published by Sega. It was directed by Jeff Fowler and written by Pat Casey, Josh Miller, and John Whittington, based on a story by Casey and Miller. Jim Carrey, Ben Schwartz, Colleen O'Shaughnessey, Natasha Rothwell, Shemar Moore, James Marsden, Tika Sumpter, and Idris Elba reprise their roles, with Krysten Ritter and Keanu Reeves joining the cast. In the film, Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles face a new enemy, Shadow the Hedgehog, who allies with the mad scientists Ivo and Gerald Robotnik in pursuit of revenge against humanity.
trendingreason: The article on Wikipedia for "Sonic the Hedgehog 3" might be trending due to its announcement as a highly anticipated sequel, featuring familiar voice actors like Jim Carrey reprising his role and new additions such as Keanu Reeves in key roles. Additionally, fans may have been intrigued by plot details hinting at complex storytelling with themes of revenge and alliances against the antagonists from past games which aligns well with current entertainment trends towards more nuanced character developments within sequels.

title: Panama_Canal
extract: The Panama Canal is an artificial 82-kilometer (51-mile) waterway in Panama that connects the Atlantic Ocean with the Pacific Ocean, cutting across the Isthmus of Panama, and is a conduit for maritime trade. Locks at each end lift ships up to Gatun Lake, an artificial fresh water lake 26 meters (85 ft) above sea level, created by damming up the Chagres River and Lake Alajuela to reduce the amount of excavation work required for the canal. Locks then lower the ships at the other end. An average of 200 ML (52,000,000 US gal) of fresh water is used in a single passing of a ship. The canal is threatened by low water levels during droughts.
trendingreason: The article on Wikipedia for the Panama Canal might be trending due to recent concerns about its vulnerability to climate change, particularly regarding how decreasing rainfall and severe weather patterns could impact freshwater resources used in lock operations and lower shipping traffic through this critical maritime trade route.

title: List_of_highest-grossing_Indian_films
extract: This ranking lists the highest-grossing Indian films produced by Indian cinema, based on conservative global box office estimates as reported by organisations classified as green by Wikipedia. The figures are not adjusted for inflation. However, there is no official tracking of figures and sources publishing data are frequently pressured to increase their estimates.

title: Matt_Gaetz
extract: Matthew Louis Gaetz II is an American politician and lawyer who served as the U.S. representative for Florida's 1st congressional district from 2017 until his resignation in 2024. His district included all of Escambia, Okaloosa, and Santa Rosa counties, and portions of Walton County. A member of the Republican Party and a self-described libertarian populist, Gaetz is widely regarded as a proponent of far-right politics as well as a staunch ally of Donald Trump. In October 2023, Gaetz filed a motion to vacate which led to the removal of Kevin McCarthy as speaker of the U.S. House of Representatives.
trendingreason: The article about Matt Gaetz might be trending on Wikipedia due to recent controversies surrounding his political stance and actions that resonate with or challenge current events, particularly in light of the far-right politics movement and significant developments such as Kevin McCarthy's removal from Speaker.

title: Blake_Lively
extract: Blake Ellender Lively is an American actress. A daughter of actor Ernie Lively, she made her professional debut in his directorial project Sandman (1998). She had her breakthrough role in The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants (2005) and its 2008 sequel. Lively achieved recognition for her portrayal of Serena van der Woodsen in the CW teen drama television series Gossip Girl (2007–2012).
trendingreason: The Blake_Lively Wikipedia article may be trending on #2024-12-24 due to recent high-profile news or celebrity sightings involving her, such as announcements about upcoming projects, awards nominations or wins for roles she has portrayed in popular media like Gossip Girl.

title: Marco_(2024_film)
extract: Marco is a 2024 Kerala Malayalam-language action thriller film directed by Haneef Adeni and produced by Cubes Entertainments and Unni Mukundan films. The film stars Unni Mukundan, alongside Siddique, Jagadish, Abhimanyu S Thilakan, Kabir Duhan Singh, Anson Paul and Yukti Tareja. The music was composed by Ravi Basrur, while cinematography and editing were handled by Chandru Selvaraj and Shameer Muhammed respectively.
